channel.title: Fidelity - E/E [Lo-Fi Hip-Hop]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/fidelity
For best results, play this one on a recorded cassette tape. Headphones recommended for those sub noises. Chill out and relax with this one.
Had this song prepared for a long time now, finally had time to get around to making it into something worth listening to [spoiler](Of course that's just subjective)[/spoiler]
I think I nailed it quite well for my second real attempt at lo-fi.
![Fidelity|500x500](upload://i3jy6Zp2UW4mA5DuraOPYJ5ueXF.jpg)

item.title: Fidelity - E/E [Lo-Fi Hip-Hop]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Thanks! It’s not a style I’m really used to and I was glad I nailed it down at least in a sense.

Read full topic

item.description:
Had to click when I saw hip hop, not enough hip hop on here, good stuff, real chill
